# Rdatatable

```{r}
library(data.table)

url <- "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/HairEyeColor.csv"

dt <- fread(url)

class(dt)

names(dt)

str(dt)

dim(dt)

nrow(dt)

ncol(dt)

head(dt)

tail(dt)

summary(dt)

# get first three rows
dt[1:3]

# filter
dt[Hair == "Black"]

setkey(dt, Hair)
dt["Black"]

dt[Hair == "Black" & Sex == "Male"]

setkey(dt, Hair, Sex)
dt[.("Black", "Male")]
```

# Pandas

```{python}
import pandas as pd

url = "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/HairEyeColor.csv"

df = pd.read_csv(url)

type(df)

list(df)

df.dtypes

df.shape

len(df.index)

len(df.columns)

df.head()

df.tail()

df.describe()

# get first three rows
df[0:3]
df.iloc[:3]

# filter
df[df.Hair == "Black"]

df[df["Hair"] == "Black"]

df.query("Hair == 'Black'")

df[(df['Hair'] == 'Black') & (df['Sex'] == 'Male')]

df.query("Hair == 'Black' & Sex == 'Male'")
```
